verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> of degrees זְכוֹר־ <WH2142> remember יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> LORD לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> David אֵ֝ת <WH854> behalf כָּל־ <WH3605> All עֻנּוֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH6031> [and] all his afflictions
אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> How נִ֭שְׁבַּע <WH7650> How he sware לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD נָ֝דַ֗ר <WH5087> [and] vowed לַאֲבִ֥יר <WH46> unto the mighty יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> [God] of Jacob

אִם־ <WH518> Surely אָ֭בֹא <WH935> Surely I will not come בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> into the tabernacle בֵּיתִ֑י <WH1004> of my house אִם־ <WH518> Nor אֶ֝עֱלֶ֗ה <WH5927> nor go up עַל־ <WH5921> and עֶ֥רֶשׂ <WH6210> bed יְצוּעָֽי׃ <WH3326> bed
אִם־ <WH518> I will not אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> I will not give שְׁנַ֣ת <WH8153> sleep לְעֵינָ֑י <WH5869> to mine eyes לְֽעַפְעַפַּ֥י <WH6079> to mine eyelids תְּנוּמָֽה׃ <WH8572> [or] slumber

עַד־ <WH5704> Until אֶמְצָ֣א <WH4672> Until I find out מָ֭קוֹם <WH4725> a place לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> for the LORD מִ֝שְׁכָּנ֗וֹת <WH4908> an habitation לַאֲבִ֥יר <WH46> for the mighty יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> [God] of Jacob
הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> Behold שְׁמַֽעֲנ֥וּהָ <WH8085> Lo we heard בְאֶפְרָ֑תָה <WH672> of it at Ephratah מְ֝צָאנ֗וּהָ <WH4672> we found בִּשְׂדֵי־ <WH7704> it in the fields יָֽעַר׃ <WH3293> of the wood
נָב֥וֹאָה <WH935> We will go לְמִשְׁכְּנוֹתָ֑יו <WH4908> into his tabernacles נִ֝שְׁתַּחֲוֶ֗ה <WH7812> we will worship לַהֲדֹ֥ם <WH1916> stool רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> be able to endure
קוּמָ֣ה <WH6965> Arise יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD לִמְנוּחָתֶ֑ךָ <WH4496> into thy rest אַ֝תָּ֗ה <WH859> You וַאֲר֥וֹן <WH727> thou and the ark עֻזֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5797> of thy strength
כֹּהֲנֶ֥יךָ <WH3548> Let thy priests יִלְבְּשׁוּ־ <WH3847> be clothed צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> with righteousness וַחֲסִידֶ֥יךָ <WH2623> and let thy saints יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH7442> shout for joy

בַּ֭עֲבוּר <WH5668> the sake דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> David's עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> For thy servant אַל־ <WH408> not תָּ֝שֵׁ֗ב <WH7725> sake turn not away פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> the face מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ <WH4899> of thine anointed

נִשְׁבַּֽע־ <WH7650> hath sworn יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD לְדָוִ֡ד <WH1732> unto David אֱמֶת֮ <WH571> [in] truth לֹֽא־ <WH3808> He will not יָשׁ֪וּב <WH7725> he will not turn מִ֫מֶּ֥נָּה <WH4480> at מִפְּרִ֥י <WH6529> from it Of the fruit בִטְנְךָ֑ <WH990> of thy body אָ֝שִׁ֗ית <WH7896> will I set לְכִסֵּא־ <WH3678> upon thy throne לָֽךְ׃

אִֽם־ <WH518> If יִשְׁמְר֬וּ <WH8104> will keep בָנֶ֨יךָ ׀ <WH1121> If thy children בְּרִיתִי֮ <WH1285> my covenant וְעֵדֹתִ֥י <WH5713> and my testimony ז֗וֹ <WH2090> I אֲלַ֫מְּדֵ֥ם <WH3925> I shall teach גַּם־ <WH1571> also בְּנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH1121> them their children עֲדֵי־ <WH5703> for evermore עַ֑ד <WH5703> forever יֵ֝שְׁב֗וּ <WH3427> shall also sit לְכִסֵּא־ <WH3678> upon thy throne לָֽךְ׃
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בָחַ֣ר <WH977> hath chosen יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> For the LORD בְּצִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> Zion אִ֝וָּ֗הּ <WH183> he hath desired לְמוֹשָׁ֥ב <WH4186> [it] for his habitation לֽוֹ׃

זֹאת־ <WH2063> likewise מְנוּחָתִ֥י <WH4496> This [is] my rest עֲדֵי־ <WH5703> for ever עַ֑ד <WH5703> forever פֹּֽה־ <WH6311> Here אֵ֝שֵׁ֗ב <WH3427> here will I dwell כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִוִּתִֽיהָ׃ <WH183> for I have desired
צֵ֭ידָהּ <WH6718> her provision בָּרֵ֣ךְ <WH1288> I will abundantly אֲבָרֵ֑ךְ <WH1288> bless אֶ֝בְיוֹנֶ֗יהָ <WH34> her poor אַשְׂבִּ֥יעַֽ <WH7646> I will satisfy לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> with bread

וְֽ֭כֹהֲנֶיהָ <WH3548> her priests אַלְבִּ֣ישׁ <WH3847> I will also clothe יֶ֑שַׁע <WH3468> with salvation וַ֝חֲסִידֶ֗יהָ <WH2623> and her saints רַנֵּ֥ן <WH7442> shall shout aloud יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH7442> aloud
שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> There אַצְמִ֣יחַ <WH6779> to bud קֶ֣רֶן <WH7161> the horn לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David עָרַ֥כְתִּי <WH6186> I have ordained נֵ֝֗ר <WH5216> a lamp לִמְשִׁיחִֽי׃ <WH4899> for mine anointed
א֭וֹיְבָיו <WH341> His enemies אַלְבִּ֣ישׁ <WH3847> will I clothe בֹּ֑שֶׁת <WH1322> with shame וְ֝עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> and יָצִ֥יץ <WH6692> flourish נִזְרֽוֹ׃ <WH5145> but upon himself shall his crown
